name: StuPac 2
description:
StuPac 2 is the sequel to the not so successful StuPac. You can play it with friends, family or basically anybody. In this game, you play as one of the five heroes and try to destroy your fellow competitors.

The heroes are as listed:

  • Steve
  • Thor
  • UFO
  • Patrick
  • Cristiano Ronaldo

StuPac 2 was made entirely by Stu, including the art, music and sound effects.

Stu worked on this game for 3 weeks and tried his best, so have fun!
